title: Best of The Program | Guest:  Dr. Robert Epstein | 3/3/20
description:
MSNBC’s Chris Matthews has retired after decades of hosting “Hardball.” But was it his age, his scandals, or his refusal to play the revolutionaries’ games? Dr. Robert Epstein asks whether your vote even matters thanks to YouTube and Google. Glenn and Stu discuss all the Democrats’ terrible possible outcomes in tonight’s Super Tuesday voting. And in a “Profile in Courage,” Glenn and Stu honor the “bravery” of Mike Bloomberg and Harry Reid.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
